power_strike.name: Power Strike
power_strike.description: A powerful physical attack dealing 1.5x damage

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: Attack all enemies for reduced damage

provoke.name: Provoke
provoke.description: Force an enemy to target you for 2 turns

raise.name: Raise
raise.description: Revive a fallen ally with 50% HP

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: Increase ally's defense by 50% for 3 turns

fire.name: Fire
fire.description: Fire magic damage to one enemy

fira.name: Fira
fira.description: Stronger fire magic damage to one enemy

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: Ice magic damage to one enemy

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.description: Lightning magic damage to one enemy

steal.name: Steal
steal.description: Attempt to steal an item or gold from enemy

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: High damage attack with critical chance

mug.name: Mug
mug.description: Attack and steal in one action

edit_formula.name: Edit Formula
edit_formula.description: Temporarily modify a damage or healing formula for this battle

modify_constant.name: Modify Constant
modify_constant.description: Change a game constant (EXP rate, drop rate, etc.) - causes corruption!

analyze_code.name: Analyze Code
analyze_code.description: View the actual game code for current battle logic

create_autobattle_script.name: Create Autobattle Script
create_autobattle_script.description: Open the autobattle scripting interface mid-battle

rewind.name: Rewind
rewind.description: Rewind to previous save state (Time Mage only)

restore_point.name: Restore Point
restore_point.description: Create a restore point you can revert to

temporal_shield.name: Temporal Shield
temporal_shield.description: Protect party from next wipe by auto-rewinding

undo_death.name: Undo Death
undo_death.description: Undo a permanent death (requires Time Mage)

drain_life.name: Drain Life
drain_life.description: Steal HP from enemy and restore your own

death_sentence.name: Death Sentence
death_sentence.description: Enemy dies in 3 turns unless cleansed

corrupt_save.name: Corrupt Save
corrupt_save.description: Massively increase corruption for huge damage - DANGEROUS!

necro_blast.name: Necro Blast
necro_blast.description: Dark magic explosion hitting all enemies

permakill.name: Permakill
permakill.description: Kill enemy permanently - cannot be encountered again. HIGH RISK!

rat_swarm.name: Rat Swarm
rat_swarm.description: Summons 2 cave rats to aid in battle

filth_spray.name: Filth Spray
filth_spray.description: Sprays disgusting filth that damages and poisons all enemies

crown_authority.name: Crown Authority
crown_authority.description: The Rat King rallies all rat allies, boosting their attack

desperate_bite.name: Desperate Bite
desperate_bite.description: A powerful bite attack that deals double damage when below 30% HP

dive_attack.name: Dive Attack
dive_attack.description: Dive from above for increased damage

disease_cloud.name: Disease Cloud
disease_cloud.description: Release a cloud that poisons all enemies

royal_summon.name: Royal Summon
royal_summon.description: The Rat King summons his loyal rat guards to defend the throne
royal_summon.summon_message: The Rat King SQUEAKS imperiously! A Rat Guard answers the call!

default.name: Default
default.description: Take a defensive stance, halving damage and banking 1 BP

brave.name: Brave
brave.description: Spend stored BP to take extra actions this turn

guardian_wall.name: Guardian Wall
guardian_wall.description: Create a barrier that absorbs damage for all allies for 2 turns

last_stand_ability.name: Last Stand
last_stand_ability.description: Massive attack that deals more damage the lower your HP

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: Throw a smoke bomb to guarantee escape or blind enemies for 2 turns

shadow_step.name: Shadow Step
shadow_step.description: Vanish into shadows, gaining evasion and guaranteeing next attack crits

quick_strike.name: Quick Strike
quick_strike.description: Lightning-fast attack that always goes first

throw_shuriken.name: Throw Shuriken
throw_shuriken.description: Throw shurikens at all enemies for speed-scaled damage

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: Become completely invisible for 2 turns - cannot be targeted

summon_ifrit.name: Summon Ifrit
summon_ifrit.description: Summon the fire eidolon Ifrit to engulf all enemies in flames

summon_shiva.name: Summon Shiva
summon_shiva.description: Summon the ice queen Shiva to freeze all enemies

summon_ramuh.name: Summon Ramuh
summon_ramuh.description: Summon the storm elder Ramuh to strike all enemies with Judgment Bolt

summon_bahamut.name: Summon Bahamut
summon_bahamut.description: Summon the dragon king Bahamut for devastating Mega Flare

recursive_summon.name: Recursive Summon
recursive_summon.description: Summon another Summoner who summons another... (up to 3 deep). Exponential power!

mind_swap.name: Mind Swap
mind_swap.description: Swap control with target boss - you control it, AI controls you. If the boss wins, your save corrupts!

boss_puppet.name: Boss Puppet
boss_puppet.description: Force boss to use its weakest attack this turn

control_override.name: Control Override
control_override.description: Take full control of boss for 1 turn - choose its action

release_binding.name: Release Binding
release_binding.description: Break free from Mind Swap early, returning to normal control

mutual_destruction.name: Mutual Destruction
mutual_destruction.description: Kill both you and the bound boss instantly. Permanent. No takebacks.

warp_to_boss.name: Warp to Boss
warp_to_boss.description: Skip the dungeon and warp directly to the boss room. Missed loot!

skip_cutscene.name: Skip Cutscene
skip_cutscene.description: Skip any cutscene or dialogue. Miss the story, save the time.

bypass_puzzle.name: Bypass Puzzle
bypass_puzzle.description: Auto-solve any puzzle or environmental challenge

sequence_break.name: Sequence Break
sequence_break.description: Break intended game sequence to access later content early. May cause glitches!

new_game_plus_warp.name: NG+ Warp
new_game_plus_warp.description: Warp to any previously completed area with current stats and gear

leverage_position.name: Leverage Position
leverage_position.description: Set self local volatility to 2.0 for 3 turns. Recoil: take 10% max HP.

overexpose.name: Overexpose
overexpose.description: Set target local volatility to 2.0 for 3 turns, widening their damage variance.

hedge_position.name: Hedge Position
hedge_position.description: Set target local volatility to 0.5 for 3 turns, narrowing their damage variance.

press_the_edge.name: Press the Edge
press_the_edge.description: Consume 1 global band level for scaling damage. Higher band = more damage.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.description: Reveal volatility band status and tail event probability.

circuit_breaker.name: Circuit Breaker
circuit_breaker.description: Reduce global volatility band by 1, gain +1 AP.
